Installation
============

Console
****************

To install the latest version of the **naive** package with **PIP** from your preferred console, run the following command in a cell:

.. code-block:: console

    pip install https://github.com/daviddoret/naive/raw/master/dist/naive-latest.tar.gz

Jupyter Notebook
****************

To install the latest version of the **naive** package with **PIP** in a **Jupyter notebook**, run the following command in a cell:

.. jupyter-execute::
    :raises:
    :stderr:

    !pip install https://github.com/daviddoret/naive/raw/master/dist/naive-latest.tar.gz

Import
****************

Once installed, to import the **naive** package, add the following import instruction in your code:

.. jupyter-execute::
    :raises:
    :stderr:

    import naive
